title: Mini Cheesecakes
description: This recipe is absolute saver. I bake these cheesecake for every bigger party.
story:
Very easy recipe, everytime comes as expected. Best on the second day after baking.

You can play with topping: jelly, jam, whipped cream, just berries - as well as keep it simple clean. I use cupcakes liners, but if you want - you can pour the mixture strait into small baking molds.

ingredients.name: cream cheese
ingredients.preparationNotes: (I take either Mascarpone or Philadelphia, or mix these two in equal parts)

ingredients.name: sour cream
ingredients.preparationNotes: (I take the sour cream fattest you can get)

instructions: Preheat oven to 175 C (or use cheesecake program).
Crush cookies and nuts and chocolate and combine everything with melted butter. Put on the bottom of cupcakes forms.
Mix cream cheese with sugar and milk, add eggs one at a time, add sour cream, vanilla and flour. Mix everything.
Chill at least for 2 hours in refrigerator.
You can decorate these beauties with jam or jelly on top (chill cheesecakes before doing so).
